title: Ep. 22. Petals to the Metal - Chapter Five
description: Our heroes attempt a sneaking mission to retrieve a vital Battlewagon component, and end up doing something ghoulish that they'll have to keep secret forever. Also, a beloved character returns. Merle saves his heals. Taako grows a third eye. Magnus clefts.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
